subject: re: Order #SSN3791 Confirmed Nov 23 ***request for status update please***
description_text:
Good day,
Please kindly supply status update for my order(#SSN3791 Confirmed Nov 23).
ordered 11/23 and no status updated since.  Kindly advise trackingand perhaps origin location.
I am aware of the seasonal "high traffic" with shipping anything this time of year.  I just get a bit nervous when this much time has past with no updates (no tracking, no advise of delays or other).
I look forward to an update soon as I have sold my previous pedal set to help pay for this one and currently have none.
Thank you in advance for your time.
Best regards,
James "Tim" Talbert

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 7256 中
